item.title: Action Posture Detection
item.description: Action Posture Detection Mission Empower individuals to command correct posture regarding themselves Problem Subconscious personal habits are hard to straighten Bad posture leads to worse performance and health No proactive solution to solve this problem Solution Precise action detection algorithm to help you maintain correct posture Pragmatic solution for alerting individuals based on action detection “Invest in your posture for your future”
item.content:encoded: Action Posture Detection Mission Empower individuals to command correct posture regarding themselves Problem Subconscious personal habits are hard to straighten Bad posture leads to worse performance and health No proactive solution to solve this problem Solution Precise action detection algorithm to help you maintain correct posture Pragmatic solution for alerting individuals based on action detection &ldquo;Invest in your posture for your future&rdquo;
